text:
@JimInhofe @realDonaldTrump @POTUS we don't hear the truth from THIS @WhiteHouse 

we cannot trust the @GOP to save Americans who are hurting and unemployed

we can only count on @GOP giving your business friends and donors our money while we suffer

endless stories
https://t.co/Nwy7AtY4Bc
